thread.section_title: TicketCity Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TicketCity | www.ticketcity.com | 4 of 289
thread.title: Sheila

author: Sheila
title: Sheila
text:
My experience with Dylan Fry at Ticket City was a positive one. Dylan was always prompt to respond to my questions about my purchase of 2017 Rodeo Dierks Bentley concert. Dylan would respond to my emails even before arriving to work in the am. Very conscientious young man.
I did have a problem, however, with the fact that I did not know when I would receive my tickets. We were traveling from Alabama to Texas and was very concerned that my tickets would arrive in Alabama. Therefore, I would have no way of retrieving them since I was already in Texas. My recommendation would be to somehow create a way of converting a paper ticket to an e-ticket.
